c74object.name: fl.plus~
c74object.digest: Adds values in two input frames.
c74object.description: fl.plus~calculates pairs of values in turn.
c74object.discussion: The result is an output frame at least as long as the smaller of the two inputs. When frames mismatch in size the result depends on the setting of the mismatch parameter. Either or both inputs may be set to trigger output.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: The result is an output frame at least as long as the smaller of the two inputs. When frames mismatch in size the result depends on the setting of the mismatch parameter. Either or both inputs may be set to trigger output.
